Question: Cinemo GmbH CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Cinemo GmbH

Product: In-car Infotainment Innovations at CES 2024

- Cinemo introduces new in-car infotainment innovations at CES 2024, showcasing advanced multi-passenger use cases, transforming the car cabin into a smart entertainment platform.
- Features include in-cabin gaming, audio and video on demand (VOD) content, Dolby AtmosÂ® enablement, multi-zone audio capability, and video conferencing integrations for a multi-passenger experience.
- Cinemo's unique multiscreen offering allows drivers and passengers to enjoy entertainment, while its partner network enables popular music and video streaming services, reducing development times and total cost of ownership (TCO).
- Cinemo can be experienced at CES 2024 through live partner presentations, demonstrating its innovative in-car infotainment solutions.

For more information, contact Martina Oerther, Marketing Director, Cinemo at moerther@cinemo.com.
